title: Molten Pickaxe
summaries: It is the most powerful pre-Hardmode pickaxe, being able to break nearly every block in one hit. It is capable of mining <linked>Cobalt Ore</linked> and <linked>Palladium Ore</linked>, which makes it an essential tool for early <linked>Hardmode</linked>. It also has the benefits of emitting <linked>light</linked> and occasionally inflicting the <linked>On Fire!</linked> <linked>debuff</linked> on enemies struck.

Although the Molten Pickaxe can destroy most blocks in one hit, its <linked>mining speed</linked> is very slow, meaning many lower tier pickaxes can mine the weakest block types faster than the Molten Pickaxe. However, it is still the fastest pre-Hardmode pickaxe when mining stone tiles and above. See the chart below for more details.
Its best modifier is Light for harvesting purposes and Legendary for combat purposes.
